titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New York.
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service, not later than 180 days after its enactment, to designate a single, unique ZIP code applicable to the area encompassing only Glendale, New York.
